    • flashingItem

      public static AnimatedItem flashingItem(AnimatedItem item, String text, String format1, String format2)
      Creates a flashing item with two different formats
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add an animation to.
      text - Text to flash
      format1 - First format
      format2 - Second format
      Returns:
      The flashing item

    • flashingItem

      public static AnimatedItem flashingItem(AnimatedItem item, String text, String... formats)
      Creates a flashing item with the given text and formats
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add an animation to.
      text - Text to flash
      formats - Formats to flash in order
      Returns:
      The flashing item

    • scrollingFormatItem

      public static AnimatedItem scrollingFormatItem(AnimatedItem item, String text, int size, String defaultFormat, String scrollingFormat)
      Creates an animated item where a format "scrolls" across the item's name The amount of text set to that format is the size of the "scroll." If you used "&c" as the format, and "Hello" as the text, with "&f" as the default. The animation would be like this. "&cH&fello", "&fH&ce&fllo", etc.
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add an animation to.
      text - The text to scroll
      size - The size of the "scroll" (how many characters the scroll format takes up)
      defaultFormat - The default formatting code(s)
      scrollingFormat - The formatting code(s) for the scrolling text
      Returns:
      The animated item

    • scrollingText

      public static AnimatedItem scrollingText(AnimatedItem item, int size, String fullText)
      Creates an animated item where a item's name will scroll over a given text
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add an animation to.
      size - The amount of characters in the scroll
      fullText - The full text to scroll over
      Returns:
      The animated item with the scrolling text

    • scrollingLore

      public static ComplexAnimatedItem scrollingLore(ComplexAnimatedItem item, int size, List<String> beforeScroll, List<String> afterScroll, List<String> textToScroll, boolean displayEllipsis)
      Creates a complex animated item where the item's lore will scroll over a given list of text
      Parameters:
      item - The item to add an animation to.
      size - The amount of lines in the scroll
      beforeScroll - The text to display before the scroll
      afterScroll - The text to display after the scroll
      textToScroll - The text to scroll over
      displayEllipsis - Whether to display ellipses (...) in the scrolling text
      Returns:
      The animated item with the scrolling text
